QuestData.Title: Unlocking History
QuestData.Description:
I'm sure you're wondering why I've brought you here.
Located somewhere inside this cottage is a hidden door. If we can find a way to access it, the answer to your questions, and possibly our survival against the coven, should lie beyond.
Help me search for it, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the secret passageway in the Forgotten Lodge.
QuestData.CompletionText: The opening must be here somewhere...
QuestData.RewardText:
You found it! I knew that they were more than stories!
Come, let us see what's inside.
